channel.title: ::yell (::message)
channel.description:
Ok on my server, I have ::message(same as ::yell). I want to make it so, if your an owner, admin, mod or donators it says [owner] Owner elite - message here
So if i did ::yell it would say this
[owner] Owner Elite - Hello
[donator] - joe - hello
If you know how to help, please leave a reply
Thanks,
-Will

item.title: ::yell (::message)
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

Coded this just now. Hope it works :). Works on my server tho

}
if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "";
            }
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@dgr@[Moderator]@bla@ ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@dbl@[Admin]@bla@ ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@dbl@[Co-Owner]@bla@ ";
            }
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dark")) {
                titles = "@dre@[Owner]@bla@ ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}

Read full topic
